title: Bank Asia, Incepta Pharma sign strategic agreement
body: The agreement was signed by Nurullah Chaudhury, additional managing director & chief wholesale banking officer, Bank Asia PLC, and Naimul Huda, executive director, finance & accounts, Incepta Pharmaceuticals Bank Asia PLC and Incepta Pharmaceuticals Limited have signed a strategic agreement to introduce an integrated cash management solution and strengthening the partnership between the two organizations. The signing ceremony was held on December 11 at head office of Incepta Pharmaceuticals Limited, Tejgaon, Dhaka. The agreement was signed by Nurullah Chaudhury, additional managing director & chief wholesale banking officer, Bank Asia PLC, and Naimul Huda, executive director, finance & accounts, Incepta Pharmaceuticals Limited. Under this partnership, Incepta will utilize Bank Asiaâ€™s extensive collection network to enhance financial efficiency, streamline fund management, and improve service delivery across its nationwide operations. Senior officials from both organizations attended the ceremony, highlighting the importance of this collaboration and their shared commitment to innovation and sustainable growth.
